License.Text:
This End User License Agreement ("Agreement") is a legal agreement between you ("You") and Entgra, (Private) Limited, regarding the enrollment of Your personal mobile device ("Device") in SoR's mobile device management program, and the loading to and removal from Your Device and Your use of certain applications and any associated software and user documentation, whether provided in "online" or electronic format, used in connection with the operation of or provision of services to Entgra, Inc., BY SELECTING "I ACCEPT" DURING INSTALLATION, YOU ARE ENROLLING YOUR DEVICE, AND THEREBY AUTHORIZING SOR OR ITS AGENTS TO INSTALL, UPDATE AND REMOVE THE APPS FROM YOUR DEVICE AS DESCRIBED IN THIS AGREEMENT. YOU ARE ALSO EXPLICITLY ACKNOWLEDGING AND AGREEING THAT (1) THIS IS A BINDING CONTRACT AND (2) YOU HAVE READ AND AGREE TO THE TERMS OF THIS AGREEMENT.
IF YOU DO NOT ACCEPT THESE TERMS, DO NOT ENROLL YOUR DEVICE AND DO NOT PROCEED ANY FURTHER.
You agree that: (1) You understand and agree to be bound by the terms and conditions contained in this Agreement, and (2) You are at least 21 years old and have the legal capacity to enter into this Agreement as defined by the laws of Your jurisdiction. SoR shall have the right, without prior notice, to terminate or suspend (i) this Agreement, (ii) the enrollment of Your Device, or (iii) the functioning of the Apps in the event of a violation of this Agreement or the cessation of Your relationship with SoR (including termination of Your employment if You are an employee or expiration or termination of Your applicable franchise or supply agreement if You are a franchisee of or supplier to the Entgra (Private) Limited, system). SoR expressly reserves all rights not expressly granted herein.

uiParam.label: Message to be sent to the device

Feature.Name: Clear Password
Feature.Description: Clear current password (This functionality is only working with profile owners from Android 7.0 API 24 onwards.)

Feature.Name: Change Lock-code
Feature.Description: Change current lock code (This functionality is only working with profile owners from Android 7.0 API 24 onwards.)

uiParam.label: URL to upload file from device
File will be saved in Default download directory if not specified.
Enter PIN code* of the device.

Feature.Name: Global Proxy
Feature.Description: Setting up a network-independent global HTTP proxy on a device.

Feature.Name: Application List
Feature.Description: Request list of current installed applications

Feature.Name: Disallow user to change volume
Feature.Description: Allow or disallow user to change volume"

Feature.Name: Disallow user to change cell broadcast configurations
Feature.Description: Allow or disallow user to change cell broadcast configurations

Feature.Name: Disallow user to change user credentials
Feature.Description: Allow or disallow user to change user credentials

Feature.Name: Disallow user to change mobile networks configurations
Feature.Description: Allow or disallow user to change mobile networks configurations

Feature.Name: Disallow user to change tethering configurations
Feature.Description: Allow or disallow user to change tethering configurations

Feature.Name: Disallow user to change VPN configurations
Feature.Description: Allow or disallow user to change VPN configurations

Feature.Name: Disallow user to change WIFI configurations
Feature.Description: Allow or disallow user to change WIFI configurations

Feature.Name: Disallow user to change app control
Feature.Description: Allow or disallow user to change app control

Feature.Name: Disallow user to change app control configurations
Feature.Description: Allow or disallow user to change app control configurations

Feature.Name: Disallow cross profile copy paste
Feature.Description: Allow or disallow cross profile copy paste

Feature.Name: Disallow install unknown sources
Feature.Description: Allow or disallow install unknown sources

Feature.Name: Disallow mount physical media
Feature.Description: Allow or disallow mount physical media

Feature.Name: Disallow usb file transfer
Feature.Description: Allow or disallow usb file transfer

Feature.Name: Disallow parent profile app linking
Feature.Description: Allow or disallow parent profile app linking

Feature.Name: Disallow ensure verify apps
Feature.Description: Allow or disallow ensure verify apps

Panel.Title: Passcode Policy
Panel.Description: Enforce a configured passcode policy on Android devices. Once this profile is applied, the device owners won't be able to modify the password settings on their devices.

PanelItem.Label: Allow Simple Value
PanelItem.Tooltip: Permits repeating, ascending and descending character sequences

PanelItem.Label: Require alphanumeric value
PanelItem.Tooltip: Mandates to contain both letters and numbers

PanelItem.Label: Minimum passcode length
PanelItem.Tooltip: Minimum number of characters allowed in a passcode

PanelItem.Label: Minimum number of complex characters
PanelItem.Tooltip: Minimum number of complex or non-alphanumeric characters allowed in a passcode

PanelItem.Label: Maximum passcode age in days
PanelItem.Tooltip: Number of days after which a passcode must be changed

Optional.Placeholder: Should be in between 1-to-730 days or 0 for none

Rules.ValidationMsg: Should be in between 1-to-730 days or 0 for none

PanelItem.Label: Passcode history
PanelItem.Tooltip: Number of consequent unique passcodes to be used before reuse

Optional.Placeholder: Should be in between 1-to-50 passcodes or 0 for none

Rules.ValidationMsg: Should be in between 1-to-50 passcodes or 0 for none

PanelItem.Label: Maximum number of failed attempts
PanelItem.Tooltip: The maximum number of incorrect password entries allowed. If the correct password is not entered within the allowed number of attempts, the data on the device will be erased.

PanelItem.Label: Enabled Work profile passcode
PanelItem.Tooltip: Enabled Work profile passcode.

PanelItem.Label: Allow Simple Value
PanelItem.Tooltip: Permits repeating, ascending and descending character sequences

PanelItem.Label: Require alphanumeric value
PanelItem.Tooltip: Mandates to contain both letters and numbers

PanelItem.Label: Minimum passcode length
PanelItem.Tooltip: Minimum number of characters allowed in a passcode

PanelItem.Label: Minimum number of complex characters
PanelItem.Tooltip: Minimum number of complex or non-alphanumeric characters allowed in a passcode

PanelItem.Label: Maximum passcode age in days
PanelItem.Tooltip: Number of days after which a passcode must be changed

Optional.Placeholder: Should be in between 1-to-730 days or 0 for none

Rules.ValidationMsg: Should be in between 1-to-730 days or 0 for none

PanelItem.Label: Passcode history
PanelItem.Tooltip: Number of consequent unique passcodes to be used before reuse

Optional.Placeholder: Should be in between 1-to-50 passcodes or 0 for none

Rules.ValidationMsg: Should be in between 1-to-50 passcodes or 0 for none

PanelItem.Label: Maximum number of failed attempts
PanelItem.Tooltip: The maximum number of incorrect password entries allowed. If the correct password is not entered within the allowed number of attempts, the data on the device will be erased.

Panel.Title: Restrictions
Panel.Description: This configurations can be used to restrict certain settings on an Android device. Once this configuration profile is installed on a device, corresponding users will not be able to modify these settings on their devices.

PanelItem.Label: Allow use of camera
PanelItem.Tooltip: Enables the usage of device camera

PanelItem.Label: Below Restrictions are valid only when the Agent is work-profile owner or device owner.
Disallow configuring VPN
PanelItem.Tooltip: Users are restricted from configuring VPN.

PanelItem.Label: Disallow configuring app control
PanelItem.Tooltip: Restricts users from modifying applications in the device's settings or launchers.

PanelItem.Label: Disallow cross profile copy paste
PanelItem.Tooltip: Device owners are restricted from copying items that are copied to the clipboard from the managed profile to the parent profile or vice-versa.

PanelItem.Label: Disallow debugging
PanelItem.Tooltip: Users are restricted from accessing debug logs.

PanelItem.Label: Disallow install apps
PanelItem.Tooltip: Users are restricted from installing applications.

PanelItem.Label: Disallow install from unknown sources
PanelItem.Tooltip: Users are restricted from installing applications from unknown origin.

PanelItem.Label: Disallow modify accounts
PanelItem.Tooltip: Users are restricted from modifying user accounts.

PanelItem.Label: Disallow outgoing beam
PanelItem.Tooltip: Users are restricted from using NFC bump.

PanelItem.Label: Disallow location sharing
PanelItem.Tooltip: Users are restricted from sharing their geo-location.

PanelItem.Label: Disallow uninstall apps
PanelItem.Tooltip: Users are restricted from uninstalling applications.

PanelItem.Label: Disallow parent profile app linking
PanelItem.Tooltip: Allows apps in the parent profile to access or handle web links from the managed profile.

PanelItem.Label: Below restrictions will be applicable when the agent is the device owner and Android version 6.0 (Marshmallow) or higher.
Disallow set wallpaper
PanelItem.Tooltip: Users are restricted from setting wallpapers.

PanelItem.Label: Disallow set user icon
PanelItem.Tooltip: Users are restricted from changing their icon.

PanelItem.Label: Disallow remove managed profile
PanelItem.Tooltip: Users are restricted from removing the managed profile.

PanelItem.Label: Disallow autofill
PanelItem.Tooltip: Users are restricted from using autofill services.

PanelItem.Label: Disallow bluetooth
PanelItem.Tooltip: Bluetooth is disallowed on the device.

PanelItem.Label: Disallow bluetooth sharing
PanelItem.Tooltip: Users are restricted from Bluetooth sharing on the device.

PanelItem.Label: Disallow remove user
PanelItem.Tooltip: Users are restricted from removing user itself.

PanelItem.Label: Below Restrictions are valid only when the Agent is the device owner.
Disallow SMS
PanelItem.Tooltip: Users are restricted from sending SMS messages.

PanelItem.Label: Ensure verifying apps
PanelItem.Tooltip: Ensure app verification.

PanelItem.Label: Enable auto timing
PanelItem.Tooltip: Enables the auto time feature that is in the device's Settings > Data and Time.

PanelItem.Label: Disable screen capture
PanelItem.Tooltip: Screen capturing would be disable.

PanelItem.Label: Disallow volume adjust
PanelItem.Tooltip: Users are restricted from adjusting device volume.

PanelItem.Label: Disallow cell broadcast
PanelItem.Tooltip: Users are restricted from configuring cell broadcast.

PanelItem.Label: Disallow configuring bluetooth
PanelItem.Tooltip: Users are restricted from configuring bluetooth.

PanelItem.Label: Disallow configuring mobile networks
PanelItem.Tooltip: Users are restricted from configuring mobile network.

PanelItem.Label: Disallow configuring tethering
PanelItem.Tooltip: Users are restricted from configuring tethering.

PanelItem.Label: Disallow configuring WIFI
PanelItem.Tooltip: Users are restricted from configuring Wifi.

PanelItem.Label: Disallow safe boot
PanelItem.Tooltip: Users are restricted to enter safe boot mode.

PanelItem.Label: Disallow outgoing calls
PanelItem.Tooltip: Users are restricted from taking calls.

PanelItem.Label: Disallow mount physical media
PanelItem.Tooltip: Users are restricted from mounting the device as physical media.

PanelItem.Label: Disallow create window
PanelItem.Tooltip: Restricts device owners from opening new windows beside the app windows.

PanelItem.Label: Disallow factory reset
PanelItem.Tooltip: Users are restricted from performing factory reset.

PanelItem.Label: Disallow remove user
PanelItem.Tooltip: Users are restricted from removing user.

PanelItem.Label: Disallow add user
PanelItem.Tooltip: Users are restricted from creating new users.

PanelItem.Label: Disallow network reset
PanelItem.Tooltip: Users are restricted from resetting network.

PanelItem.Label: Disallow USB file transfer
PanelItem.Tooltip: Users are restricted from transferring files via USB.

PanelItem.Label: Disallow unmute microphone
PanelItem.Tooltip: Users are restricted from unmuting the microphone.

PanelItem.Label: Below restrictions will be applied on devices with Android version 6.0 Marshmallow onwards only.
Disable status bar
PanelItem.Tooltip: Checking this will disable the status bar.

PanelItem.Label: Disallow data roaming
PanelItem.Tooltip: Users are restricted from using cellular data when roaming.

PanelItem.Label: Enable device backup service
PanelItem.Tooltip: Device backup service will be enabled.

Panel.Title: Encryption Settings
Panel.Description: This configuration can be used to encrypt data on an Android device, when the device is locked and make it readable when the passcode is entered. Once this configuration profile is installed on a device, corresponding users will not be able to modify these settings on their devices.

PanelItem.Label: Un-check following checkbox in case you do not need the device to be encrypted.
Enable storage-encryption
PanelItem.Tooltip: Having this checked would enable Storage-encryption in the device.

Panel.Title: Wi-Fi Settings
Panel.Description: This configurations can be used to configure Wi-Fi access on an Android device. Once this configuration profile is installed on a device, corresponding users will not be able to modify these settings on their devices.

PanelItem.Label: Please note that * sign represents required fields of data.
Service Set Identifier (SSID) *
PanelItem.Tooltip: Identification of the wireless network to be configured.

PanelItem.Label: Security *
PanelItem.Tooltip: Minimum number of complex or non-alphanumeric characters allowed in a passcode

PanelItem.Label: Password *
PanelItem.Tooltip: Password for the wireless network.

PanelItem.Label: Password *
PanelItem.Tooltip: Password for the wireless network.

PanelItem.Label: EAP Method
PanelItem.Tooltip: EAP Method of the wireless network to be configured.

PanelItem.Label: Phase 2 Authentication
PanelItem.Tooltip: Phase 2 authentication of the wireless network to be configured.

PanelItem.Label: Identify
PanelItem.Tooltip: Identify of the wireless network to be configured.

PanelItem.Label: Anonymous Identity
PanelItem.Tooltip: Identity of the wireless network to be configured.

PanelItem.Label: CA Certificate
PanelItem.Tooltip: CA Certificate for the wireless network.

PanelItem.Label: Password *
PanelItem.Tooltip: Password for the wireless network.

PanelItem.Label: Phase 2 Authentication
PanelItem.Tooltip: Phase 2 authentication of the wireless network to be configured.

PanelItem.Label: Identify
PanelItem.Tooltip: Identify of the wireless network to be configured.

PanelItem.Label: Anonymous Identity
PanelItem.Tooltip: Identity of the wireless network to be configured.

PanelItem.Label: CA Certificate
PanelItem.Tooltip: CA Certificate for the wireless network.

PanelItem.Label: Password *
PanelItem.Tooltip: Password for the wireless network.

PanelItem.Label: Identify
PanelItem.Tooltip: Identify of the wireless network to be configured.

PanelItem.Label: CA Certificate
PanelItem.Tooltip: CA Certificate for the wireless network.

PanelItem.Label: Identify
PanelItem.Tooltip: Identify of the wireless network to be configured.

PanelItem.Label: Password *
PanelItem.Tooltip: Password for the wireless network.

Panel.Title: Global Proxy Settings
Panel.Description: This configurations can be used to set a network-independent global HTTP proxy on an Android device. Once this configuration profile is installed on a device, all the network traffic will be routed through the proxy server.

PanelItem.Label: This profile requires the agent application to be the device owner.
This proxy is only a recommendation and it is possible that some apps will ignore it.
Please note that * sign represents required fields of data.
Proxy Configuration Type
PanelItem.Tooltip: Select the configuration type.

PanelItem.Label: Proxy Host *
PanelItem.Tooltip: Host name/IP address of the proxy server.

PanelItem.Label: Proxy Port *
PanelItem.Tooltip: Target port for the proxy server.

PanelItem.Label: Proxy Exclusion List
PanelItem.Tooltip: Add host names to this separated by commas to prevent them from routing through the proxy server. The hostname entries can be wildcards such as *.example.com

PanelItem.Label: Proxy PAC File URL *
PanelItem.Tooltip: URL for the proxy auto config PAC script.

Panel.Title: VPN Settings
Panel.Description: Configure the OpenVPN settings on Android devices. In order to enable this, device needs to have "OpenVPN for Android" application installed.

PanelItem.Label: OpenVPN Server Config file
PanelItem.Tooltip: OpenVPN configurations ovpn file.

Panel.Title: Always On VPN Settings
Panel.Description: Configure an always-on VPN connection through a specific VPN client application.

PanelItem.Label: Below configurations are valid only when the Agent is work-profile owner or device owner.
VPN Client Application Package name*
PanelItem.Tooltip: Package name of the VPN client application to be configured.

Optional.Placeholder: Should be a valid package name

Panel.Title: Certificate Install Settings
Panel.Description: Configure the certificate install settings on Android devices.

PanelItem.Label: Added Certificate List
PanelItem.Tooltip: Add a certificate.

Panel.Title: Work-Profile Configurations
Panel.Description: Configure these settings to manage the applications in the work profile.

PanelItem.Label: Profile name
PanelItem.Tooltip: name of the Work-Profile created by IOT Server Agent.

PanelItem.Label: Enable System Apps
PanelItem.Tooltip: The set of system apps needed to be added to the work-profile.

Optional.Placeholder: Should be exact package names separated by commas. Ex: com.google.android.apps.maps, com.google.android.calculator

PanelItem.Label: Hide System Apps
PanelItem.Tooltip: The set of system apps needed to be hide in the work-profile.

Optional.Placeholder: Should be exact package names separated by commas. Ex: com.google.android.apps.maps, com.google.android.calculator

PanelItem.Label: Unhide System Apps
PanelItem.Tooltip: The set of system apps needed to be unhide in the work-profile.

Optional.Placeholder: Should be exact package names separated by commas. Ex: com.google.android.apps.maps, com.google.android.calculator

PanelItem.Label: Enable Google PlayStore Apps
PanelItem.Tooltip: The set of apps needed to be installed from Google PlayStore to work-profile.

Optional.Placeholder: Should be exact package names separated by commas. Ex: com.google.android.apps.maps, com.google.android.calculator

Panel.Title: COSU Profile Configurations
Panel.Description: This policy can be used to configure the profile of COSU Devices.

PanelItem.Label: Start Time
PanelItem.Tooltip: Start time for the device

PanelItem.Label: End Time
PanelItem.Tooltip: Lock-down time for the device

PanelItem.Label: Device will be operable only during the above period.
Launcher background image
PanelItem.Tooltip: This is the image that will be displayed in kiosk background.

Optional.Placeholder: Should be a valid URL of jpg or jpeg or png

PanelItem.Label: Company logo to display
PanelItem.Tooltip: Company logo to display

Optional.Placeholder: Should be a valid URL ending with .jpg, .png, .jpeg

PanelItem.Label: Company name
PanelItem.Tooltip: Company name

PanelItem.Label: Is single application mode
PanelItem.Tooltip: Is single application mode

PanelItem.Label: Selected initial app in Enrollment Application Install policy config will be selected for single application mode.
Is application built for Kiosk
PanelItem.Tooltip: Is single mode app built for Kisosk. Enable if lock task method is called in the application

PanelItem.Label: Is idle media enabled
PanelItem.Tooltip: Is idle media enabled

PanelItem.Label: Media to display while idle
PanelItem.Tooltip: Media to display while the device is idle

Optional.Placeholder: Should be a valid URL ending with .jpg, .png, .jpeg, .mp4, .3gp, .wmv, .mkv

PanelItem.Label: Idle graphic begin after(seconds)
PanelItem.Tooltip: Idle graphic begin after the defined seconds

PanelItem.Label: Is multi-user device
PanelItem.Tooltip: Is multi-user device.

PanelItem.Label: Is login needed for user switch
PanelItem.Tooltip: Permits repeating, ascending and descending character sequences

PanelItem.Label: Provide comma separated package name or web clip details for applications. eg: com.google.android.apps.maps, {\"identity\":\"http:entgra.io/\",\"title\":\"entgra-webclip\"}
Primary User Apps
PanelItem.Tooltip: Primary User is the user to which the device is enrolled

PanelItem.Label: Add User Applications
PanelItem.Tooltip: Add User Applications.

PanelItem.Label: Device display orientation
PanelItem.Tooltip: Device display orientation

PanelItem.Label: Enable Browser Properties
PanelItem.Tooltip: Browser Properties

PanelItem.Label: Primary URL
PanelItem.Tooltip: Primary URL

PanelItem.Label: Enable browser address bar
PanelItem.Tooltip: Enables address bar of the browser

PanelItem.Label: Is allow to go back on a page
PanelItem.Tooltip: Allow to go back in a page

PanelItem.Label: Is it allowed to go forward in browser
PanelItem.Tooltip: Is it allowed to go forward in a web page

PanelItem.Label: Is home button enabled
PanelItem.Tooltip: Is home button enabled

PanelItem.Label: Is page reload enabled
PanelItem.Tooltip: Is page reload enabled

PanelItem.Label: Only allowed to visit the primary url
PanelItem.Tooltip: Only allowed to visit the primary url

PanelItem.Label: Is javascript enabled
PanelItem.Tooltip: Is javascript enabled

PanelItem.Label: Is copying to visit the primary url
PanelItem.Tooltip: Is copying to visit the primary url

PanelItem.Label: Is downloading files enabled
PanelItem.Tooltip: Is downloading files enabled

PanelItem.Label: Is Kiosk limited to one webapp
PanelItem.Tooltip: Is Kiosk limited to one webapp

PanelItem.Label: Is form auto-fill enabled
PanelItem.Tooltip: Is form auto-fill enabled.

PanelItem.Label: Is content access enabled
PanelItem.Tooltip: Enables or disable content URL access within WebView. Content URL access allows WebView to load content from a content provider installed in the system.

PanelItem.Label: Is file access allowed
PanelItem.Tooltip: Sets whether javascript running in the context of a file schema URL should be allowed to access content from other file scheme URLs.

PanelItem.Label: Is allowed universal access from file URLs
PanelItem.Tooltip: Sets whether JavaScript running in the context of a file scheme URL should be allowed to access content from any origin

PanelItem.Label: Is application cache enabled
PanelItem.Tooltip: Is application cache enabled

PanelItem.Label: Application cache file path
PanelItem.Tooltip: Sets the path to the Application Cache files. In order for the Application Caches API to be enabled, this method must be called with a path to which the application can write

PanelItem.Label: Application cache mode
PanelItem.Tooltip: Overrides the way the cache is used. The way the cache is used is based on the navigation type. For a normal page load, the cache is checked and content is re-validated as needed. When navigating back, content is not revalidated, instead the content is just retrieved from the cache. This method allows the client to override this behavior by specifying one of LOAD_DEFAULT, LOAD_CACHE_ELSE_NETWORK, LOAD_NO_CACHE or LOAD_CACHE_ONLY

PanelItem.Label: Should load images
PanelItem.Tooltip: Sets whether the browser should load image resources (through network and cached). Note that this method controls loading of all images, including those embedded using the data URI scheme.

PanelItem.Label: Block image loads via network
PanelItem.Tooltip: Sets whether the browser should not load image resources from the network (resources accessed via http and https URI schemes)

PanelItem.Label: Block all resource loads from network
PanelItem.Tooltip: Sets whether the browser should not load any resources from the network.

PanelItem.Label: Support zooming
PanelItem.Tooltip: Sets whether the browser should support zooming using its on-screen zoom controls and gestures

PanelItem.Label: Show on-screen zoom controllers
PanelItem.Tooltip: Sets whether the browser should display on-screen zoom controls. Gesture based controllers are still available

PanelItem.Label: Text zoom percentage
PanelItem.Tooltip: Sets the text zoom of the page in percent

PanelItem.Label: Default font size
PanelItem.Tooltip: Sets the default font size

Optional.Placeholder: Should be a positive number between 1 and 72

PanelItem.Label: Default text encoding name
PanelItem.Tooltip: Sets the default text encoding name to use when decoding html pages

PanelItem.Label: Is database storage API enabled
PanelItem.Tooltip: Sets whether the database storage API is enabled.

PanelItem.Label: Is DOM storage API enabled
PanelItem.Tooltip: Sets whether the DOM storage API is enabled.

PanelItem.Label: Is Geo-location enabled
PanelItem.Tooltip: Sets whether Geo-location API is enabled.

PanelItem.Label: Can JavaScript open windows
PanelItem.Tooltip: JavaScript can open window automatically or not. This applies to the JavaScript function window.open()

PanelItem.Label: Does media playback requires user consent
PanelItem.Tooltip: Sets whether the browser requires a user gesture to play media. If false, the browser can play media without user consent

PanelItem.Label: Is safe browsing enabled
PanelItem.Tooltip: Sets whether safe browsing in enabled. Safe browsing allows browser to protect against malware and phishing attacks by verifying the links.

PanelItem.Label: Use wide view port
PanelItem.Tooltip: Sets whether the browser should enable support for the viewport HTML meta tag or should use a wide viewport. When the value of the setting is false, the layout width is always set to the width of the browser control in device-independent (CSS) pixels. When the value is true and the page contains the viewport meta tag, the value of the width specified in th tag is used. If the page does not contain the tag or does not provide a width, then a wide viewport will be used

PanelItem.Label: Browser user agent string
PanelItem.Tooltip: Sets the WebView's user-agent string

Optional.Placeholder: Should be a valid user agent string

PanelItem.Label: Mixed content mode
PanelItem.Tooltip: Configures the browser's behavior when a secure origin attempts to load a resource from an insecure origin

Panel.Title: Application Restriction Settings
Panel.Description: This configuration can be used to encrypt data on an Android device, when the device is locked and make it readable when the passcode is entered. Once this configuration profile is installed on a device, corresponding users will not be able to modify these settings on their devices.

PanelItem.Label: Select type
PanelItem.Tooltip: Select a type to proceed

PanelItem.Label: Restricted Application List
PanelItem.Tooltip: Add an application to restrict.

Panel.Title: Runtime Permission Policy (COSU / Work Profile)
Panel.Description: This configuration can be used to set a runtime permission policy to an Android Device.

PanelItem.Label: Set default runtime permission
PanelItem.Tooltip: When an app requests a runtime permission this enforces whether the user needs to prompted or the permission either automatically granted or denied

PanelItem.Label: Set app-specific runtime permissions
PanelItem.Tooltip: Add an application and set permission policy for a specific permission it need.

Panel.Title: System Update Policy (COSU)
Panel.Description: This configuration can be used to set a passcode policy to an Android Device. Once this configuration profile is installed on a device, corresponding users will not be able to modify these settings on their devices.

PanelItem.Label: System Update
PanelItem.Tooltip: Type of the System Update to be set by the Device Owner.

PanelItem.Label: Below configuration of start time and end time are valid only when window option is selected.
Start Time
PanelItem.Tooltip: Window start time for system update

PanelItem.Label: End Time
PanelItem.Tooltip: Window end time for system update

Panel.Title: Enrollment Application Install
Panel.Description: This configuration can be used to install applications during Android device enrollment.

PanelItem.Label: This configuration will be applied only during Android device enrollment.
App Auto Update Policy
PanelItem.Tooltip: The Auto-update policy for apps installed on the device

PanelItem.Label: App Availability to a User
PanelItem.Tooltip: The availability granted to the user for the specified app

Panel.Title: Display Message Configuration
Panel.Description: Configure these settings to manage the applications in the show message.

PanelItem.Label: Lock Screen Message
PanelItem.Tooltip: The message that needs to show on the lock-screen

Optional.LabelDescription: Below lock screen message is valid only when the Agent is the device owner.

PanelItem.Label: Setting App Support Message
PanelItem.Tooltip: The message that needs to show on the device administrators apps.

PanelItem.Label: Disabled Setting Support Message
PanelItem.Tooltip: The message that needs to show on the screens where functionality has been disabled by the admin. Max length is 200
